params.name:
Stage Position instead of Position Offset
If activated, Will set to the X and Y coordinates instead of offsetting the cam position
Easing Style
params.type:

            'Instant (Ignores Duration and Direction)',
            'Classic (Ignores Duration and Direction)',
            'Sine',
            'Quad',
            'Cube',
            'Quart',
            'Quint',
            'Expo',
            'Smooth Step',
            'Elastic')
